title: Episode 248: Everything You Need to Know About Mushrooms
description:
When are you supposed to salt mushrooms? How do you know when the wild ones are worth the splurge? Do you really need to clean them? Basically editor Sarah Jampel is answering all of your mushroom questions. Then, digital director Carey Polis chats with Catherine Bailey and Robin Petravic, the owners of the iconic Heath Ceramics. Last but not least, senior staff writer Alex Beggs is back with the next installment of Cook, Marry, Kill.

Get the recipes from this episode:
Seared Mushrooms with Garlic and Thyme
Mushroom Carbonara
